usage: Audience performance metrics and engagement rates

dataMapping.title: Audience Performance Metrics
dataMapping.subtitle: Key audience engagement and targeting performance indicators

metrics.secondaryLabel: Comprehensive audience engagement and conversion metrics across segments

items.targetLabel: Target conversion rate for optimal performance
insights: Audience behavior insights (e.g., 'Health-conscious millennials show 40% higher engagement with video content', 'Premium segment responds better to personalized messaging')
risks: Audience targeting risks (e.g., 'Seasonal fitness motivation may impact engagement', 'Competition for premium audience attention')
recommendations: Targeting optimization recommendations (e.g., 'Focus video content on Instagram and TikTok for millennial segment', 'Implement lookalike modeling for premium users')

items.actualLabel: Current audience reach and targeting accuracy
items.targetLabel: Target reach efficiency for optimal coverage
insights: Reach efficiency insights (e.g., 'Cross-device targeting improves reach by 25%', 'Lookalike audiences expand reach while maintaining quality')
risks: Reach optimization risks (e.g., 'Over-targeting may limit scale', 'Privacy changes affect targeting precision')
recommendations: Reach optimization recommendations (e.g., 'Implement first-party data strategies', 'Expand lookalike modeling to similar demographics')

items.targetLabel: Target lifetime value for segment optimization
insights: LTV insights (e.g., 'Premium fitness users show 60% higher LTV', 'Early engagement predicts long-term value')
risks: LTV risks (e.g., 'Subscription churn may impact long-term value', 'Market saturation affects premium pricing')
recommendations: LTV optimization recommendations (e.g., 'Focus retention campaigns on high-value segments', 'Implement progressive profiling for personalization')
